frontmatter.title: 01. Welcome to Reimagining the Internet
frontmatter.subtitle: Presented by the Institute for Digital Public Infrastructure at UMass Amherst
frontmatter.author: Institute for Digital Public Infrastructure
frontmatter.excerpt: Our host Ethan Zuckerman introduces iDPI's new podcast by talking about the need for creating online spaces in the public interest, serving civic good instead of a corporate profit motive. Join us as we interview activists, scholars, journalists, and entrepreneurs reimagining the internet as we know it today.
